content: this sweet crochet lamb bib would make a nice easter or baby shower present the butterfly applique is optional a sweet embellishment for baby girls you can make the bib in one solid color or try a two color version **french translation** provided by julie suit son fil 1 available **here** 2 **danish translation** available **here** 3 1 http //www ravelry com/people/juliesuitsonfil 2 http //www myhobbyiscrochet com/2015/04/bavoir-agneau-au-crochet-patron-gratuit html 3 http //www myhobbyiscrochet com/2016/03/lille-lamme-hagesmk-gratis-opskrift html don t miss a thing subscribe to my free newsletter 4 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 5 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 6 join our community of crocheters and have fun 4 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 5 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 6 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/
